text: La Circe is a 1665 opera by Pietro Andrea Ziani to a libretto by Cristoforo Ivanovich (1620-1689). It was first performed for the birthday of the Holy Roman Emperor Leopold I in Vienna in 1665. It was revived by Ars Minerva in San Francisco in 2017.https://www.sfcv.org/event/ars-minerva/la-circe-0 ==References== Category:1665 operas
title: La Circe (Ziani)
